fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Watch another player each night. You'll receive any night messages they do, but night message related to killing or similar things will be replaced with harmless ones.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the player you watch dies at night, you'll become a Scarred (see below) and be unable to act the next night.
- If you're killed by something other than your Vulnerable defense and hanging, you'll die but become an Angel (see below).
- Town roles that kill you, including by being a visitor when you died due to Vulnerable defense, will commit suicide the next night out of guilt.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Become a Scarred or an Angel and win.
